definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Two threshold cryptosystems secure against chosen ciphertext attacks are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出两个抗选择密文攻击的门限密码系统。

sentences.english: FPLL (Frequency and Phase Locked Loop) is a new kind of threshold extended demodulator for satellite TV receivers.
sentences.chinese: FPLL是一种新型卫星电视门限扩展解调器。

sentences.english: Threshold cryptography provides a way in which the secret key can be shared secretly.
sentences.chinese: 门限密码学提供了一种安全的密钥共享方法。

sentences.english: An elliptic curve threshold signature encryption scheme with the specified verifier is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种指定接收者椭圆曲线门限群签名加密方案。

sentences.english: So the threshold is actually for warding off evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 如此门限实际上是为保护邪恶的精神。

sentences.english: It combines the adaptive algorithm with variable threshold and the turning-point.
sentences.chinese: 它是将自适应变门限算法与转折点算法相结合。

sentences.english: The hall-door, which was half of glass, stood open; I stepped over the threshold.
sentences.chinese: 一半装玻璃的过厅门是开着的，我走出门限。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new method for image segmentation via adaptive thresholding.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种新的自适应门限图象分割方法。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
